long_description: Perfect for warm-weather treks along your favorite trails, the Solar Bucket Hat from Sunday Afternoons delivers cool comfort thanks to lightweight fabric, a wide brim and breeze-friendly ventilation. Soft, lightweight nylon fabric resists rain, stains and dries quickly; hat packs flat for easy transport. Polyester mesh panels promote ventilation and cooling. Built-in UPF 50+ sun protection shields skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Sunday Afternoons Solar Bucket Hat features a moisture-wicking internal polyester headband and adjustable chinstrap.
short_description: Perfect for warm-weather treks along your favorite trails, the Solar Bucket Hat from Sunday Afternoons delivers cool comfort thanks to lightweight fabric, a wide brim and breeze-friendly ventilation.
